org.apache.poi.hwpf.converter

Interface PicturesManager


  • @Beta
public interface PicturesManager
    User-implemented pictures manager to store images on-disk(用户实现的图片管理器将图像存储在磁盘上)
    Author:
    Sergey Vladimirov (vlsergey {at} gmail {dot} com)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String savePicture(byte[] content, PictureType pictureType, java.lang.String suggestedName, float widthInches, float heightInches)
      Stores image (probably on disk).(存储图像（可能在磁盘上）。)

    • Method Detail

      • savePicture

        java.lang.String savePicture(byte[] content,
                             PictureType pictureType,
                             java.lang.String suggestedName,
                             float widthInches,
                             float heightInches)
        Stores image (probably on disk). Please, note that different output format support different file types, so image conversion may be required. For example, HTML browsers usually supports PictureType.GIF, PictureType.JPEG, PictureType.PNG, PictureType.TIFF, but rarely PictureType.EMF or PictureType.WMF. FO (Apache FOP) supports at least PNG and SVG types.(存储图像（可能在磁盘上）。请注意，不同的输出格式支持不同的文件类型，因此可能需要图像转换。例如，HTML浏览器通常支持PictureType. GIF、PictureType. JPEG、PictureType. PNG、PictureType. Tivf，但很少支持PictureType.EMF或PictureType. WMF。FO（Apache FOP）至少支持PNG和JPEG类型。)
        Parameters:
        content - picture content(内容-图片内容)
        pictureType - detected picture type (may be PictureType.UNKNOWN(pictureType -检测到的图片类型（可能是PictureType.UNKNOWN)
        suggestedName - suggested picture name (based on picture offset in file), supposed to be unique(AppultedName-建议的图片名称（基于文件中的图片偏差），应该是唯一的)
        widthInches - display width in inches (scaled). May be useful for rendering vector images (such as EMF or WMF)(WidthInches -以英寸为单位显示宽度（缩放）。可能对于渲染载体图像（例如EMF或WMF）很有用)
        heightInches - display height in inches (scaled). May be useful for rendering vector images (such as EMF or WMF)(heightInches -以英寸为单位显示高度（缩放）。可能对于渲染载体图像（例如EMF或WMF）很有用)
        Returns:
        path to file that can be used as reference in HTML (img's src) of XLS FO (fo:external-graphic's src) or null if image were not saved and should not be referenced from result HTML / FO.(文件路径，可用作XLS FO（fo：external-graphic's src）的HTML（img's src）中的引用;如果图像未保存，则为null，并且不应从结果HTML / FO中引用。)
